name: Rubén Darío
description: Nicaraguan poet, journalist, and diplomat, leader of the Spanish-American literary movement known as modernismo
philosophy: Art for art's sake, beauty as the supreme ideal, and poetry as the highest expression of human creativity.
quotes: Poetry is the most ancient form of human expression
If a poet knows more about a horse than he does about heaven, he might better stick to the horse
To be sincere is to be potent
